item.title: Cargo Door Hook Systems (Main Lower Lobe Cargo Doors and Main Deck Side Cargo Door) (Electrical Function)

numlitem.para: There is no damage to the hook mechanism, and
Doors are closed and locked using an accepted maintenance manual procedure.

placard.para: Placard on Cargo Door control panel(s): "ELECTRICAL HOOK ACTUATION – INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Visually check associated door's hook mechanism to confirm no damage exists.

Open, close, latch and lock the associated door using the appropriate Maintenance Manual procedure (AMM 52-32-00 for Main Deck Side Cargo Door, AMM 52-34-00 for Lower Lobe Cargo Door). The appropriate procedure will be contained in one or more of the following Maintenance Manual paragraphs:
Open or close door with one or more electrically inoperative actuators.
